titleStmt.title: A little stream of divine sweetness from the living fountaine for the paradice of God.
titleStmt.author: W. B. (William Blake), fl. 1650-1670.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G.D. sould by Tho: Brewster and Greg: Moule, at the three Bibles in Pauls Church-yard, neer the West-end,
